Windlord::

Windlord heard interested and said "What's happened with your 
commander's Program? why did he attacked Aerotaur?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Terrataur::
>        She quickly tells him the name of their group (I haven't 
decided what 
> it is yet so don't ask.)  "We came here looking for our comrade 
Aerotaur.  He 
> was wounded severely by our former commander and launched in a 
stasis pod.  
> Which we tracked to this planet where we found him.  When we were 
complete we 
> were a gestalt team. That is the other reason we needed to track 
him down.  
> Aerotaur was our second in command, before the incident.  We need 
him to help 
> us take on our former commander and fix his programming."  She 
looked grimly 
> at Windlord.
